title: Rip Curl: designing and marketing wetsuits
creator_credit: Media Australia, Geoff Russell and Peter Wiseman
brief_description: The Rip Curl company based in Torquay, Australia is internationally recognised for its range of wetsuits. This program is ideal for senior secondary students of Design, Textiles, Materials and Technology, and Marketing/Business Management. Topics include how wetsuits work, their design and the ways in which Rip Curl markets its famous product as well as the importance of brand names and logos.
